mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER(MID,MPASSWORD,MNAME,MBIRTH,MEMAIL,MADDRESS, MPHONE, MPROFILEPIC, KAKAOID,NAVERID) VALUES(#{mid}, '', #{mname}, #{mbirth}, #{memail}, #{fulladdress}, #{mphone}, #{mprofilepicname}, #{kakaoId},'')

INSERT INTO MEMBER(MID,MPASSWORD,MNAME,MBIRTH,MEMAIL,MADDRESS, MPHONE, MPROFILEPIC, KAKAOID,NAVERID) VALUES(#{mid}, '', #{mname}, #{mbirth}, #{memail}, #{fulladdress}, #{mphone}, #{mprofilepicname},'', #{naverId})
mapper.select: SELECT ID FROM MEMBER WHERE ID=#{id} AND PASSWORD=#{password}
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET NAME=#{name}, EMAIL=#{email} WHERE ID=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT ID FROM MEMBER WHERE ID=#{id}
